files.name: main.py
files.content:
numberOne = int(input("Enter a number (0 to exit): "))


def number (x):
  numberTwo = int(input("Enter another number: "))
  Sum = (x + numberTwo)
  Product = (x * numberTwo)
  print (x, "+", numberTwo, "=", Sum)
  print (x, "*", numberTwo, "=", Product)
  
  
while (True):
  if (numberOne == 0):
    print ( "All Done." )
    break
  else:  
    number (numberOne)
    numberOne = int(input("Enter a number (0 to exit): "))
